title: A Maine-based company is helping fishermen become kelp farmers to adapt to climate change
body: "When you're putting it on your plate and replacing broccoli, you're actually adding something that is net positive," says Briana Warner, CEO of Atlantic Sea Farms. [Photo: courtesy ...

title: With new retail products, Atlantic Sea Farms seeks to expand kelp market
body: Atlantic Sea Farms A kelp farm can produce three to seven pounds per foot of line. With up to 18,000 feet of line in the water, "that's a lot of kelp," said Atlantic Sea Farms CEO Briana Warner.
